name: Leaper (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: M.J. Gannon - Bug-Byte. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

It sounds simple, all you have to do is get Leaper to the top of the screen by jumping through the gap. The aim is to do it 6 times and light up his name in lights. The Gribblies to watch out for include: Gub-Gubs, Mutant Hot X-Burns, the Last VW, Cupids Arrow, The Giro-Biro, and UFO's.

Amazing all action arcade animation & sonics from Martin 'Och aye, it's great' Gannon. 6 really nasty Gribblies, 6 levels, 3 tunes, and even The Last VW.

Start the game: START
Left/Right: Cursor keys
Jump: B

Start the game: ENTER
Left/Right: Arrow keys
Jump: X

https://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Leaper
WLS Homepage link
